resources.string: "Contacts permissions are needed for providing email completions."
Password too short, enter minimum 8 characters!
Authentication failed, check your email and password or sign up
Not a member? Get registered in Firebase now!
This is the practice page. Press Volume Down to start session.
You can enter your own text here if you wish to.
We just need your registered Email Id to sent you password reset instructions.
The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy dog
Select a setting order for this phone.
Select a phrase setting for this session.
This is the Practice Page. Press volume down to start session.
Press continue to login session. In the next page you are going to be asked to login and verify the password 2 times.
For the next 10 phrases, please use only one hand, switch keyboard to ThumbStroke and turn accessibility mode off.
For the next 10 phrases, please use only one hand, switch keyboard to QWERTY and turn accessibility mode on.
For the next 10 phrases, please use two hands , switch keyboard to ThumbStroke and turn accessibility mode off.
For the next 10 phrases, please use two hands, switch keyboard to QWERTY and turn accessibility mode on.
Welcome to the KMAI Mobile App.
You can only proceed with registration after completing the pre-experiment survey.
Now it\'s time to complete the post-experiment survey. Please select "complete" at the bottom of the screen and receive additional instructions for follow-ups

Now, you are given a tutorial on how to use the mobile app to enter text. You will learn how to enter the text using the two different keyboards with one hand and two hands seperately. You will also learn how to switch between the two keyboards and to switch the accessibility mode on/off. After you are done with the tutorial, please select "Continue" at the bottom of the screen.

It\'s time to practice with the mobile app. The practice consists of 4 mini-sessions. In each session you will be asked to login and enter 5 or more text phrases using one of the keyboards with one or two hands.
This session consists of 4 sessions. In each session, you will be asked to login and enter 10 or more text phrases using one of the keyboards with one or two hands.

A short explanation of the experiment app. To change to ThumbStroke : Click on the above EditBox. At the bottom right or the notification bar, you will get an option to Select Keyboard. Select the option and select the StrokeIME keyboard. We recommend to switch accessibility mode off when you are using the ThumbStroke Keyboard for better use. To change to QWERTY - Click on the above EditBox. At the bottom right or the notification bar, you will get an option to Select Keyboard. Select the option and select the StrokeIME keyboard. . To enable accessibility mode press the lock button till you hear a vibration and then double tap on the screen using two fingers till you hear a audio message to enable the accessibility mode.
